segments.text: Hello , this is Mr . Morris Pitt . I'd like to speak to Mr . Bell , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just a moment . I am sorry . At the moment , he is out of the office . Would you like to leave your number ? When he comes back , I will tell him to call you back .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please have him call me at my office . He knows the number .
segments.speaker: S2
